## Source: ossf-package-analysis (387d97d2771b4d02eb1e07831089413d12a5433a784594be2b4b701e5b4b960c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'local-dep' @ 7.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
